about.officeAddress: P2 – Hamriyah Business Centre, Hamriyah Free Zone, Sharjah, United Arab Emirates
about.description: PETROFLEX FZE is a UAE-based trading company licensed by the Hamriyah Free Zone Authority, specializing in the import, export, and international trading of petrochemicals, polymers, raw materials, and crude oil outside the UAE.

contact.address: P2 – Hamriyah Business Centre, Hamriyah Free Zone, Sharjah, United Arab Emirates

whyChooseUsSection.heading: Innovative Solutions for Every Challenge
whyChooseUsSection.description: No matter how complex the problem, we find creative and effective solutions that drive long-term success.

accordionItems.title: What services do you offer?
accordionItems.content: We provide chartering, logistics, product trading, and cargo movement solutions across international markets.

accordionItems.title: Do you handle international shipments?
accordionItems.content: Yes, we operate globally with trusted partners across major ports.

accordionItems.title: How can I request a quote?
accordionItems.content: You can request a quote through our contact page — our team will respond promptly.

serviceSection.heading: Global trading services tailored for industrial markets
serviceSection.description: We provide reliable trading and supply services in petrochemicals, polymers, base oils, and industrial raw materials across international markets.

services.title: Petrochemical & Polymer Trading
services.description: International trading and distribution of petrochemicals and polymer products across global markets.

services.title: Industrial Raw Material Supply
services.description: Supplying high-quality industrial raw materials to support manufacturing and production sectors worldwide.

services.title: Base Oil & Additives Trading
services.description: Trading of base oils and additives for lubricant blending and specialized industrial applications.

hero.heading: Unlock global markets with trusted trade solutions
hero.description: PETROFLEX FZE is a UAE-based trading company specializing in the import, export, and international trading of petrochemicals, polymers, raw materials, and crude oil across global markets.

productSection.heading: Petrochemical, polymer, and raw material trading solutions
productSection.description: Explore our portfolio of petrochemicals, polymers, base oils, and industrial raw materials, supplied to meet global trade and industry requirements.

products.title: Petrochemicals & Raw Materials
products.description: Trading and global distribution of petrochemicals and industrial raw materials to support manufacturing and energy sectors worldwide.

products.title: Crude Oil Trading Abroad
products.description: International trading of crude oil outside the UAE, conducted in compliance with global trade regulations.

petroChemicalsPage.heading: Petrochemicals & Raw Materials Trading
petroChemicalsPage.description: We specialize in the international trading and distribution of petrochemicals and industrial raw materials, supporting manufacturers and energy sectors across global markets.

supportingContent.text: Our trading operations are designed to handle bulk shipments and specialized requirements with a strong focus on quality control, regulatory compliance, and efficient global logistics.

petroChemicalsPage.paragraph: By working closely with trusted suppliers and international partners, we ensure consistent material availability, competitive pricing, and long-term reliability for our clients. Our expertise in petrochemical and raw material trading enables businesses to optimize production processes while reducing operational risks.
